name: MIRROR: who's the fairest of them all?
name_original: MIRROR: who's the fairest of them all?
description:
WARNING: This piece uses glitch art GIFs as a story element, and at the time of its uploading, may cause discomfort and possibly trigger previously undetected epileptic symptoms or seizures in persons who have no history of prior seizures or epilepsy.

DO NOT PLAY THIS PIECE IF YOU ARE PHOTOSENSITIVE / PRONE TO EPILEPTIC SEIZURES.

An update will be made to slow down the framerate of the GIFs to lessen the effect, though the warning still stands.

MIRROR is an interactive fiction piece that uses glitch art as a specific story element - to help personify the titular character: the magic mirror.

Players like you have a chance to see if they are indeed the fairest of them all, as the mirror presses them with various questions.

Depending on your response, you may find out very interesting tidbits about the mirror itself.

Have fun!

There may be a bit of a wait in the beginning, due to the size of the HTML file. Also, the experience will be MUCH better (and playable) in full screen mode, so enable that!
